	6.2.2.9&#160; All other expenses which under generally accepted accounting principles would be considered as an expense of the Property.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, all expenses (whether or not such expenses are enumerated on items 1 through 11 of this
<U>
	Section&nbsp;6.2.2
</U>
	) which would be considered capital in nature under generally accepted accounting principles shall be excluded from &#147;Building Expenses&#148; unless same are amortized in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles over the useful life of the improvement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	8.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Services and Utilities
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	. Effective as of January&nbsp;1, 2015,
<U>
	Section&nbsp;23
</U>
	of the Lease is hereby deleted in its entirety and the following is hereby inserted in lieu thereof:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	23.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Services and Utilities
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	.&nbsp; Landlord shall provide the following listed services and utilities, namely:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	electric energy in accordance with
<U>
	Section&nbsp;24
</U>
	following;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	hot and cold water sufficient for drinking, lavatory toilet and ordinary cleaning purposes from fixtures either within the Premises (if provided pursuant to this Lease) or on the floor on which the Premises are located, all in accordance with
<U>
	Section&nbsp;24
</U>
	following; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	maintenance of exterior Common Areas in a manner comparable to other first class suburban office buildings in the Baltimore-Washington corridor.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Landlord reserves the right to stop service of the plumbing and electric systems, when necessary, by reason of accident, or emergency, or for repairs, alterations, replacements, or improvements, which in the judgment of Landlord are desirable or necessary to be made, until the repairs, alterations, replacements, or improvements shall have been completed.&nbsp; Landlord shall have no responsibility or liability for failure to supply plumbing and electric service, during the period when prevented from so doing by laws, orders, or regulations of any Federal, State, County or Municipal authority or by strikes, accidents or by any other cause whatsoever beyond Landlord&#146;s control.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	9.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Tenant&#146;s Proportionate Share
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	. As of the date of this Amendment, the term &#147;Tenant&#146;s Proportionate Share&#148; means that percentage which is computed by a fraction, the numerator of which is the Rentable Area of the Premises and the denominator of which is the Rentable Area of the Building.&#160; As of the date of this Amendment, Tenant&#146;s Proportionate Share is 100%.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=5,EFW="2223659",CP="OSIRIS THERAPEUTICS, INC.",DN="2",CHK=516619,FOLIO='',FILE="DISK131:[14ZDG2.14ZDG13302]26233-2-KS-01_ZDG13302.CHC",USER="BGARDNE",CD='MAR 13 05:04 2015' -->
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	10.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Option to Extend Lease Term
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	.&#160; Landlord and Tenant hereby agree that all remaining options to extend the Term of the Lease pursuant to
<U>
	Section&nbsp;3.3
</U>
	of the Lease are hereby deleted and Tenant shall have the right and option to extend the Term of the Lease in accordance with the provisions set forth below.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Tenant shall have the option to extend the Term of the Lease for two (2)&nbsp;additional periods of five (5)&nbsp;years each (the &#147;Second Renewal Term&#148; and &#147;Third Renewal Term&#148;) to commence immediately upon the expiration of the First Renewal Term or the Second Renewal Term, as applicable, provided Tenant is not in default of any term, covenant or condition of the Lease after the expiration of all applicable cure periods (i)&nbsp;on the date Tenant notifies Landlord of its intent to exercise for the applicable Renewal Term and (ii)&nbsp;on the date the applicable Renewal Term is otherwise scheduled to commence.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Tenant&#146;s rental of the Premises during the Second Renewal Term and Third Renewal Term shall be upon the same terms, covenants and conditions contained in the Lease, except that Tenant shall pay to Landlord as Base Rent the &#147;Prevailing Market Rate&#148; for the Premises for the Second Renewal Term or the Third Renewal Term, as applicable, as hereinafter defined (including annual adjustments).&#160; The term &#147;Prevailing Market Rate&#148; shall mean the then prevailing market rate being charged for comparable space in comparable office buildings within a ten (10)&nbsp;mile radius of the Premises, with consideration given for construction allowances, commissions, free rent, and other concessions or premiums.&#160; In order to exercise its option granted herein, Tenant shall notify Landlord in writing of its intent to renew not less than twelve (12) months prior to the expiration of the First Renewal Term or the Second Renewal Term, as applicable.&#160; Within thirty (30) days following the exercise by Tenant of its option to extend the Lease for the Second Renewal Term or the Third Renewal Term, as applicable, Landlord shall notify Tenant in writing of its determination of the Prevailing Market Rate for the Second Renewal Term or the Third Renewal Term, as applicable, as reasonably determined by Landlord (&#147;Landlord&#146;s Notice&#148;). Within ten (10)&nbsp;days after receipt of Landlord&#146;s Notice, Tenant shall notify Landlord in writing of Tenant&#146;s acceptance or rejection of such rate.&#160; If Tenant shall accept such Prevailing Market Rate, Landlord and Tenant shall enter into an amendment to the Lease acknowledging such renewal and setting forth any terms at variance with the terms of the Lease.&#160; If within the ten (10)&nbsp;day period, Tenant shall reject such Prevailing Market Rate as determined by Landlord for the Second Renewal Term or the Third Renewal Term, as applicable, then within twenty (20) days thereafter, Landlord and Tenant shall meet at a mutually acceptable time and place and shall use their reasonable efforts to agree upon the Prevailing Market Rate. If Landlord and Tenant shall fail to agree upon such Prevailing Market Rate within the twenty (20) day period, Landlord and Tenant shall each appoint an independent experience Howard County commercial leasing broker licensed in the Maryland area with at least ten (10)&nbsp;years experience working with tenants having a title equivalent to Vice President or above within the next ten (10)&nbsp;days (the &#147;Brokers&#148;). Such Brokers shall deliver their respective estimates of the Prevailing Market Rate within ten (10)&nbsp;days after being appointed. If the estimates of the Prevailing Market Rate as quoted by the Brokers are within seven percent (7%) of each other, the Prevailing Market Rate shall be deemed to be the average of the estimates presented by the Brokers.&#160; If the estimates of the Prevailing Market Rate as quoted by the Brokers differ by more than seven percent (7%), then Landlord and Tenant shall jointly appoint a third independent commercial leasing broker licensed in the Maryland area using the same broker criteria set forth above within ten (10)&nbsp;days after the receipt of the initial brokers&#146; estimates (the &#147;Third Broker&#148;) who shall deliver its estimate of the Prevailing Market Rate within ten (10)&nbsp;days after being appointed and such estimate shall be deemed to be the Prevailing Market Rate.&#160; Tenant shall notify Landlord within ten (10)&nbsp;days after receipt of the estimate of the Prevailing Market Rate (whether as resulting from the average of the Brokers or from the Third Broker, as applicable), whether Tenant shall accept such Prevailing Market Rate, whereupon Landlord and Tenant shall enter into an amendment to the Lease acknowledging such renewal and setting forth any terms at variance with the terms of the Lease. If (i)&nbsp;Tenant shall fail to deliver the requisite notice exercising its option to extend by the date prescribed above, (ii)&nbsp;Tenant does not respond within ten (10)&nbsp;days following receipt of Landlord&#146;s Notice or (iii)&nbsp;Tenant does not accept the Prevailing Market Rate within ten (10)&nbsp;days following Landlord&#146;s notification of the Prevailing Market Rate, as determined either by the average of the Brokers or from the Third Broker, as applicable, then Tenant&#146;s option to extend the Lease for the Second Renewal Term or the Third Renewal Term, as the case may be, shall be void and inoperable. Landlord and Tenant shall each pay the fee of the broker designated by them originally and shall split the fees of the Third Broker.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained herein, Landlord hereby agrees that Tenant may elect to exercise either Renewal Term for only a portion of the Premises which is not less than fifty percent (50%) of
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE COLOR="#010101" ALIGN="LEFT">
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage7"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	the Rentable Area of the Premises as of the date of this Amendment; provided, however, the surrendered portion of the Premises shall be of size, dimension and location which is reasonably approved by Landlord so that Landlord can market such space to a third-party. In such event, Landlord shall pay all costs to re-demise the Premises.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	11.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Options to Terminate
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	11.1
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	First Termination Right
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	. Tenant shall have the right to terminate the Lease during the First Renewal Term effective on July&nbsp;31, 2019, provided that (i)&nbsp;Tenant gives Landlord at least nine (9)&nbsp;months prior written notice of its intent to terminate the Lease, (ii)&nbsp;prior to the effective date of termination, there has been a &#147;change in control&#148; event whereby (A)&nbsp;more than fifty percent (50%) of the voting stock of Tenant has been acquired by any individual or entity (other than employees or shareholders of Tenant) or (B)&nbsp;a sale of substantially all of Tenant&#146;s assets has occurred, (iii)&nbsp;there is no outstanding Event of Default beyond all applicable cure periods at the time that Tenant notifies Landlord of its intent to terminate the Lease or as of the date of termination, and (iv)&nbsp;on or before the effective date of termination, Tenant pays to Landlord a termination fee in the amount equal to the sum of (w)&nbsp;the unamortized amount of the Allowance paid by Landlord, at Landlord&#146;s expense, in accordance with the provisions of
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2
</U>
	&nbsp;of this Amendment applying an interest rate of eight and one-half percent (8.5%) per annum, (x)&nbsp;unamortized amount of the brokerage commissions payable in accordance with
<U>
	Section&nbsp;15
</U>
	of this Amendment, applying an interest rate of eight and one-half percent (8.5%) per annum, (y)&nbsp;unamortized amount (using a 15 year amortization period) of the costs of Landlord&#146;s HVAC Work and Landlord&#146;s Roof Work (as such terms are defined in
<U>
	Sections 3 and 4
</U>
	of this Amendment, respectively), applying an interest rate of eight and one-half percent (8.5%) per annum, and (z)&nbsp;an amount equal to nine (9)&nbsp;Monthly Installments of Annual Base Rent in effect as of the date of termination. If Tenant fails to exercise its termination rights strictly in accordance with the foregoing provision, the Lease shall remain in full force and effect and Tenant shall have no further right to terminate the Lease except as set forth in
<U>
	Section&nbsp;11.2
</U>
	below.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	11.2
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Second Termination Right
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	. Provided Tenant has exercised its right to terminate the Lease in accordance with
<U>
	Section&nbsp;11.1
</U>
	above, Tenant shall have the right to terminate the Lease during the First Renewal Term effective on July&nbsp;31, 2021, provided that (i)&nbsp;Tenant gives Landlord at least twelve (12) months prior written notice of its intent to terminate the Lease, (ii)&nbsp;prior to the effective date of termination, there has been a &#147;change in control&#148; event whereby (A)&nbsp;more than fifty percent (50%) of the voting stock of Tenant has been acquired by any individual or entity (other than employees or shareholders of Tenant) or (B)&nbsp;a sale of substantially all of Tenant&#146;s assets has occurred, (iii)&nbsp;there is no outstanding Event of Default beyond all applicable cure periods at the time that Tenant notifies Landlord of its intent to terminate the Lease or as of the date of termination, and (iv)&nbsp;on or before the effective date of termination, Tenant pays to Landlord a termination fee in the amount equal to the sum of (x)&nbsp;the unamortized amount of the Allowance paid by Landlord, at Landlord&#146;s expense, in accordance with the provisions of
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2
</U>
	&nbsp;of this Amendment applying an interest rate of eight and one-half percent (8.5%) per annum, (y)&nbsp;unamortized amount of the brokerage commissions payable in accordance with
<U>
	Section&nbsp;15
</U>
	of this Amendment, applying an interest rate of eight and one-half percent (8.5%) per annum and (z)&nbsp;an amount equal to six (6)&nbsp;Monthly Installments of Annual Base Rent in effect as of the date of termination. If Tenant fails to exercise its termination rights strictly in accordance with the foregoing provision, the Lease shall remain in full force and effect and Tenant shall have no further right to terminate the Lease.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	12.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Reserved Parking
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	. Within thirty (30) days following the date of this Amendment, Landlord shall designate twenty (20) parking spaces directly in front of the Building as &#147;OSIRIS or Visitor Reserved&#148; at no cost to Tenant, and any reasonable and actual costs incurred by Landlord to properly designate such spaces shall be paid from the Allowance or reimbursed by Tenant within thirty (30) days following receipt of written request. The designation of such twenty (20) parking spaces shall continue so long as Tenant is the sole occupant of the Building.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	13.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Security Deposit
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	.&#160; Within ten (10)&nbsp;days following the date of this Amendment, Landlord hereby agrees to release the Letter of Credit issued by Wells Fargo Bank, N.A. to satisfy Tenant&#146;s obligations under Section&nbsp;4 of the Lease, and in lieu thereof, Landlord agrees to accept from Tenant a cash or Letter of Credit Security Deposit in an amount equal to Ninety Five Thousand Six Hundred Twenty Nine and 69/100 Dollars ($95,629.69) (the &#147;Security Deposit&#146;). The Security Deposit shall be paid by Tenant simultaneously with the execution of this Amendment.&#160; Landlord shall deliver the released Letter of Credit to Tenant within ten (10)&nbsp;days following receipt of the Security Deposit.&#160; The Security Deposit shall be held by Landlord for the remainder of the Tern in accordance with Section&nbsp;4 of the Lease as modified below.
</FONT>

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage8"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">

</FONT>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Accordingly, as of the date of this Amendment,
<U>
	Section&nbsp;4
</U>
	of the Lease is hereby deleted in its entirety and the following is inserted in its place:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Security Deposit
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Security Deposit
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	.&nbsp; Tenant has this day paid to Landlord the Security Deposit to be held by Landlord as security for the payment and performance by Tenant of all obligations imposed on Tenant hereunder, in an account the proceeds of which may be commingled by Landlord with any other account or proceeds.&nbsp; If Tenant shall perform all such obligations, the Security Deposit shall be refunded to Tenant, without interest, following the end of the Term.&nbsp; If Tenant shall default in any such obligation and such default shall continue beyond all applicable cure periods, Landlord shall be entitled to apply all or any portion of the Security Deposit, pro tanto, to cure any such default, and Tenant shall replenish the Security Deposit to the full amount within thirty (30) days after receipt of a written notice from Landlord which sets forth the amount to be replenished.&#160; If the Security Deposit is not fully restored, it shall constitute an immediate Event of Default (as defined in
<U>
	Section&nbsp;21
</U>
	) under the terms of the Lease (without need of notice or the expiration of any cure period), and Landlord shall have the benefit of all remedies permitted pursuant to the terms of the Lease and the laws of the State of Maryland. The Security Deposit shall not be considered an advance payment of rent or a measure of Landlord&#146;s damages in case of default by Tenant. In the event of the sale or transfer of Landlord&#146;s interest in the Building, Landlord shall have the right to transfer the Security Deposit to the purchaser or transferee and upon such transfer Tenant shall look only to the new landlord for the return of the Security Deposit and Landlord shall thereupon be released from all liability to Tenant for the return of or accounting for the Security Deposit.&#148;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Notwithstanding anything contained herein to the contrary, there shall be no reduction in the amount of the Security Deposit held by Landlord prior to the expiration of the of the Lease.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	14.

<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>

<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	SNDA
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	. Within sixty (60) days following the date of this Amendment, Landlord, at its sole cost and expense, hereby agrees to use commercially reasonable efforts to procure a Subordination, Nondisturbance and Attornment Agreement (&#147;SNDA&#148;) signed by any current mortgagee in the form attached hereto as
<U>
	Exhibit&nbsp;&#147;A&#148;
</U>
	. In addition, Landlord shall use commercially reasonable efforts to obtain an SNDA from any future mortgagee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	15.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Broker
</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	.&#160;&#160; Tenant represents that Tenant has not dealt directly or indirectly with any broker in connection with this Amendment other than Jones Lang LaSalle Brokerage,&nbsp;Inc. (&#147;Broker&#148;), and Tenant warrants that no other broker negotiated this Amendment or is entitled to any commissions in connection with this Amendment.&#160; Tenant shall indemnify and hold Landlord harmless for any breach of the foregoing representations.&#160; Landlord shall pay Broker its commission due for the First Renewal Term.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

</FONT>
</U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	.&#160; All other terms, covenants and conditions of the Lease shall remain the same and continue in full force and effect, and shall be deemed unchanged, except as such terms, covenants and conditions of the Lease have been amended or modified by this Amendment and this Amendment shall, by this reference, constitute a part of the Lease.
</FONT>

<TR>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

<TD WIDTH="6%" COLSPAN="2" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:6.68%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">

	Title:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="28%" COLSPAN="2" VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER:NONE;BORDER-BOTTOM:SOLID WINDOWTEXT 1.0PT;PADDING:0IN 0IN 0IN 0IN;WIDTH:28.96%;">

<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_2"></A>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit&nbsp;10.9
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EXCLUSIVE SERVICE AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	THIS EXCLUSIVE SERVICE AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	, including all appendices hereto and as may be amended from time to time (this &#147;
<B>
	Agreement
</B>
	&#148;), is made and entered into effective as of the 19th day of December, 2014 (the &#147;
<B>
	Effective Date
</B>
	&#148;), by and between Howmedica Osteonics Corp., also referred to as Stryker Orthopaedics (&#147;
<B>
	Stryker
</B>
	&#148;), a New Jersey corporation, having a place of business at 325 Corporate Drive, Mahwah, New Jersey 07430 and Osiris Therapeutics,&nbsp;Inc. (&#147;
<B>
	Osiris
</B>
	&#148;), a Maryland corporation, having a place of business at 7015 Albert Einstein Drive, Columbia, Maryland 21046.&#160; Stryker and Osiris are sometimes referred to herein, individually, as a &#147;
<B>
	Party
</B>
	&#148; and, collectively, as the &#147;
<B>
	Parties
</B>
	.&#148;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	WHEREAS,
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Osiris develops, processes and distributes human tissue allografts for medical use, including its proprietary OvationOS&#174; viable bone matrix allograft;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	WHEREAS,
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Stryker, together with its Affiliates (as defined below), develops, manufactures, distributes and sells a wide range of medical technology products and services, including products and services for use in orthopaedic surgery; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	WHEREAS,
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Osiris wishes to appoint Stryker as its exclusive (to the extent provided below), worldwide marketer and promoter of the Allograft Services (as defined below), and Stryker wishes to accept such appointment, all subject to and in accordance with the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOW THEREFORE
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	, for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which is hereby acknowledged, the Parties agree as follows.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;I
<BR>
	CERTAIN DEFINITIONS
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.1
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Act
</B>
	&#148; means the United States Federal Food, Drug and Cosmetic Act, as amended to date and as may be further amended from time to time during the Term, and the regulations promulgated with respect thereto.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.2
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Affiliate
</B>
	&#148; means, with respect to any particular Person, any other Person controlling, controlled by or under common control with such Person.&#160; For purposes of this definition, &#147;
<B>
	control
</B>
	&#148; (including the terms &#147;
<B>
	controlling
</B>
	,&#148; &#147;
<B>
	controlled by
</B>
	&#148; and &#147;
<B>
	under common control with
</B>
	&#148;) means the possession, direct or indirect, of the power to direct or cause the direction of the management and policies of a Person, whether through the ownership of voting securities, by contract or otherwise, and such &#147;control&#148; will be presumed if any Person owns 50% or more of the voting capital stock or other ownership interests, directly or indirectly, of any other Person.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.3
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Allograft
</B>
	&#148; means:&#160; (i)&nbsp;Osiris&#146;s OvationOS&#174; viable bone matrix allografts and (ii)&nbsp;any extensions, improvements and next generation versions of and other modifications to any such allograft for use in the Field of Use
<B>
	,
</B>
	whether or not provided under the OvationOS&#174; name, and whether or not acquired, processed, preserved, controlled, stored, transported, or distributed in the same manner as OvationOS&#174;.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1.4
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Allograft Services
</B>
	&#148; means the acquisition, processing, preservation, quality control, storage, transportation, and distribution of the Allografts.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

	.&#148;

	Change of Control
</B>
	&#148; means, with respect to a Party, the consummation of any transaction or series of related transactions that result in: (i)&nbsp;the direct or indirect acquisition of more than fifty percent (50%) of any class of equity securities of a Party (or of any Affiliate that directly or indirectly controls such Party), (ii)&nbsp;the direct or indirect acquisition of all or substantially all assets of a Party (or of any Affiliate that directly or indirectly controls

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	such Party), (iii)&nbsp;the direct or indirect acquisition of all or substantially all assets of any line of business (which is materially related to this Agreement) of such Party (or of any of its Affiliates) or (iv)&nbsp;merger, consolidation, share exchange, business combination, recapitalization, liquidation, dissolution or similar transaction involving such Party (or any Affiliate that directly or indirectly controls such Party) that if consummated would result in a Person or &#147;group&#148; (as defined in Section&nbsp;13(d)&nbsp;of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended) beneficially owning more than fifty percent (50%) of any class of equity securities of such Party (or of any Affiliate that directly or indirectly controls such Party).

<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#147;Confidential Information&#148;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	means any and all proprietary and/or confidential information of a Party or any of its Affiliates (the &#147;
<B>
	Disclosing Party
</B>
	&#148;) including trade secrets, technical information, intellectual property, business information, sales information, inventions, developments, discoveries, know-how, methods, techniques, data, processes, and other information) that the other Party (the &#147;
<B>
	Receiving Party
</B>
	&#148;) has access to or receives in connection with this Agreement, whether furnished in any form, including written, verbal, visual, electronic or in any other media or manner.&#160; Notwithstanding the foregoing, &#147;
<B>
	Confidential Information
</B>
	&#148; does not include any information that is:&#160; (i)&nbsp;rightfully known to the Receiving Party prior to receipt from the Disclosing Party, and not subject to any obligation of confidentiality; (ii)&nbsp;rightfully obtained from a third party authorized to make such a disclosure, and not subject to any obligation of confidentiality; (iii)&nbsp;independently developed by the Receiving Party; (iv)&nbsp;available to the public without restrictions or (v)&nbsp;approved for disclosure with the prior, written approval of the Disclosing Party.&#160; The Receiving Party shall not be relieved of its obligations as to any Confidential Information which is specific, merely because such specific Confidential Information is contained in general information falling within one or more of the above categories.
</FONT>
</P>

	&#147;Moral Rights&#148;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	shall mean any and all rights to claim authorship to, to be named as the author of or to publish a copyright protected work, to revoke or to object to any distortion, mutilation, or other derogatory action or modification in relation to such work, whether or not the copyright under such work is registered, whether or not such would be prejudicial to the author&#146;s reputation, and any similar right existing under common or statutory law of any country in the world or under any treaty, regardless of whether or not such right is denominated or generally referred to as a &#147;moral right.&#148;
</FONT>

<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Minimum Average Service Fee
</B>
	&#148; or &#147;
<B>
	Minimum ASF
</B>
	&#148; means [
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	] for Allograft Services (including any related shipping costs) provided per cubic centimeter of Allograft, or such other amount as is determined by the JSC pursuant to
<U>
	Section&nbsp;3.2(a)
</U>
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">

<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;II
<BR>
	APPOINTMENT OF STRYKER; EXCLUSIVITY
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2.1
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Appointment of Stryker
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; Osiris hereby appoints Stryker as the exclusive (to the extent provided in
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.3
</U>
	below) marketer and promoter of the Allograft Services for the Field of Use in the Territory during the Term (and, thereafter, on a non-exclusive basis during any Sell-Off Period).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2.2
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Subcontractors; Affiliates
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; Stryker may appoint any third party agents, distributors, co-promotion partners or other third parties to assist Stryker in the marketing and promotion of the Allograft Services and/or the provision of the Stryker Services (each, a &#147;
<B>
	Subcontractor
</B>
	&#148;).&#160; Any Affiliate of Stryker may exercise any of Stryker&#146;s rights under this Agreement.&#160; Stryker will be responsible for the performance of any of its Subcontractors and Affiliates under this Agreement, and will ensure that the rights granted to each Subcontractor or Affiliate (i)&nbsp;do not conflict with the provisions of this Agreement and (ii)&nbsp;are in compliance with applicable Law.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	2.3
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exclusivity; Extended Exclusivity Period; Non-Exclusivity Period
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exclusivity
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; During the Exclusivity Period, neither Osiris nor any of its Affiliates will (nor will any of them appoint or permit any other Person to) directly or indirectly promote, market, sell or distribute (other than through Stryker in accordance with this Agreement) any Allograft or Allograft Services to any Person in the Territory for use in the Field of Use.&#160; Osiris retains the right to present and inform (but not sell or distribute) regarding the Allografts in the Field of Use, through Osiris corporate reports and scientific presentations.&#160; With respect to scientific presentations, Osiris agrees to submit the proposed manuscript to Stryker for review and comment reasonably in advance of the proposed presentation and agrees to take into account any reasonable comments provided by Stryker with respect to the presentation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Extended Exclusivity Period
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; At the end of the Initial Exclusivity Period, Stryker, at its sole option, may elect to continue the exclusive rights granted to Stryker under this Agreement for the Extended Exclusivity Period, by paying Osiris the Extended Exclusivity Fee (as determined pursuant to
<U>
	Section&nbsp;6.2
</U>
	), if any, on or before the last day of the Initial Exclusivity Period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Non-Exclusive Extension
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; At the end of the Initial Exclusivity Period, if Stryker does not elect to extend the exclusive rights granted to Stryker under this Agreement in accordance with
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.3(b)
</U>
	, then Stryker may, at its sole option, extend the Term on a non-exclusive basis for a period of two (2)&nbsp;years from the end of the Initial Exclusivity Period, by paying Osiris the Non-Exclusive Extension Fee (as determined pursuant to
<U>
	Section&nbsp;6.3
</U>
	), if any, on or before the last day of the Initial Exclusivity Period.&#160; In the event Stryker elects to extend the Term on a non-exclusive basis,
<U>
	Sections 2.1
</U>
	,
<U>
	2.4
</U>
	, and
<U>
	4.1
</U>
	will become non-exclusive and the following terms in this Agreement will no longer apply:
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.3
</U>
	,
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.4(c)
</U>
	,
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.6
</U>
	,
<U>
	Section&nbsp;7.1
</U>
	and
<U>
	Section&nbsp;8.4
</U>
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Termination of Agreement
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	.&#160; If at the end of the Initial Exclusivity Period, Stryker neither elects to extend the Exclusivity Period pursuant to
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.3(b)
</U>
	&nbsp;nor elects to extend the Term on a non-exclusive basis pursuant to
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.3(c)
</U>
	, then this Agreement shall automatically terminate, with such termination effective as of the end of the Initial Exclusivity Period;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	,
<U>
	however
</U>
	, that if the Revenue for the Initial Exclusivity Period is less than [
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	], then, without limiting Stryker&#146;s right to receive any applicable Supply Failure Payment under
<U>
	Section&nbsp;6.5
</U>
	, Stryker will pay Osiris a
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="1" WIDTH="25%" NOSHADE COLOR="BLACK" ALIGN="LEFT">
</DIV>

<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	***
</FONT>

	Confidential information has been omitted and filed separately with the Securities and Exchange Commission.&#160; Confidential treatment has been requested with respect to this omitted information.

	.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

	Bio

</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Osiris acknowledges that Stryker intends to use the Bio
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160;Marks in connection with the Allografts and Allograft Services in lieu of any of the Osiris Marks.&#160; Stryker will, in its sole discretion, file and prosecute a trademark application with the United States Patent and Trademark Office for the Bio
</FONT>

	4
</FONT>

	&#160;Mark.&#160; In addition, Stryker may register, and operate websites located at, domain names that incorporate any of the Bio

	4
</FONT>

	&#160;Marks for the purposes of promoting the Allograft Services (the &#147;

	Bio

	4
</FONT>

	, that following any expiration or termination of this Agreement and the Sell-Off Period, (i)&nbsp;Stryker will promptly discontinue use of the Bio

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	License to Osiris Marks
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	.&#160; Osiris hereby grants Stryker a royalty-free, fully paid-up, transferable (to the extent provided in
<U>
	Section&nbsp;15.2
</U>
	), license during the Term and any Sell-Off Period in the Territory for the use in the Field of Use, with the right to grant sublicenses to Subcontractors and Affiliates pursuant to
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.2
</U>
	, to use the Osiris Marks in Stryker&#146;s promotional materials, on Stryker&#146;s and its Affiliates&#146; websites, and otherwise in connection with the marketing and promotion of the Allograft Services and Stryker&#146;s and its Subcontractors&#146; and Affiliates&#146; other activities under this Agreement with respect to the Allograft Services, all on the terms and conditions as approved in advance in writing by the JSC or otherwise approved by Osiris (such approval not to be unreasonably withheld);
<U>
	provided
</U>
	,
<U>
	however
</U>
	, that:&#160; (i)&nbsp;any proposed usage of the Osiris Marks that is submitted by Stryker to Osiris for approval will be deemed to be approved unless Osiris provides Stryker with written notice of its disapproval of such proposed usage within ten (10)&nbsp;business days after the date on which such proposed usage was submitted to Osiris for approval and (ii)&nbsp;no approval shall be required for a proposed usage of the Osiris Marks that is substantially similar to a proposed usage of the Osiris Marks that was previously approved (or deemed approved) by Osiris.&#160; Stryker is under no obligation to use the Osiris Marks.&#160; To the extent Stryker does use any of the Osiris Marks, Stryker will use the Osiris Marks solely to promote, market, sell and distribute Allograft Services during the Term and any Sell-Off Period in the Field of Use, and will not use the Osiris Marks for any other purposes.&#160; The foregoing license:&#160; (i)&nbsp;during the Exclusivity Period, shall be exclusive for use in the Field of Use (even as to Osiris), except with regard to (A)&nbsp;the Osiris name and trade dress and (B)&nbsp;Osiris&#146;s use of the Osiris Marks to perform its obligations under this Agreement, and (ii)&nbsp;shall be non-exclusive in all other respects.&#160; Any use of the Osiris Marks by Stryker will be in accordance with trademark usage guidelines reasonably specified by Osiris.&#160; Any goodwill arising from the use of the Osiris Marks shall inure to the benefit of Osiris.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Osiris Domain Names
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; During the Term, Stryker and its Affiliates shall have the right to register, and operate websites located at, the Osiris Domain Names for the purposes of promoting the Allograft Services.&#160; To enable Stryker to exercise the foregoing rights, during the Term, Osiris will provide Stryker and its Affiliates with full administrative control of the OvationOS.com domain name and any other Osiris Domain Names that are registered in the name of Osiris or any of its Affiliates.
</FONT>
