<A NAME="eolPage24"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.7PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	If the Revenue for the Initial Exclusivity Period is less than [
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	], then the Non-Exclusive Extension Fee will be an amount that is equal to One Million Five Hundred Thousand U.S. Dollars ($1,500,000) for every [***] by which the Revenue for the Initial Exclusivity Period is below [***].
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.7PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	If either:&#160; (i)&nbsp;a Supply Failure Trigger has occurred or (ii)&nbsp;the Revenue for the Initial Exclusivity Period is greater than or equal to [***], then the Non-Exclusive Extension Fee will be zero U.S. Dollars.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	6.4
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Commissions and Administration Fees
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Commissions
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	For each Service Order, Osiris will pay Stryker a commission equal to [***] of the Customer Fees that apply with respect to such Service Order (the &#147;
<B>
	Commissions
</B>
	&#148;) on or before the Payment Date that applies to such Customer Fees.&#160; For the avoidance of doubt, Osiris will pay the Commission to Stryker whether or not the associated Customer Fees have been collected from the applicable Customer (subject, however, to
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.9(b)
</U>
	&nbsp;regarding return of Commissions if Stryker determines that the associated Customer Fee is uncollectable and to
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.9(c)
</U>
	&nbsp;regarding Customer Returns).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Administration Fees
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; In addition to the Commissions, in consideration for Stryker&#146;s provision of billing and accounts receivable administration services under this Agreement, Osiris will pay Stryker an administration fee equal to [***] of the gross amount invoiced to the Customer for each Service Order (the &#147;
<B>
	Administration Fees
</B>
	&#148;).&#160; The Administration Fee for a particular Service Order will be payable to Stryker at the same time that the Commission for such Service Order is payable to Stryker.&#160; For the avoidance of doubt, Osiris will pay the Administration Fee to Stryker whether or not the associated Customer Fees have been collected from the applicable Customer (subject, however, to
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.9(b)
</U>
	&nbsp;regarding return of fifty percent (50%) of an Administration Fee if Stryker determines that the associated Customer Fee is uncollectable and to
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.9(c)
</U>
	&nbsp;regarding Customer Returns).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Netting of Payments
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; The Parties will reasonably cooperate to minimize the administrative burden of the payment provisions in
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.9
</U>
	and this
<U>
	Section&nbsp;6.4
</U>
	, including by netting of amounts payable to and by each Party under such provisions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	6.5
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Supply Failure Payments to Stryker
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	If a Supply Failure Trigger has occurred, then:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	if Revenue for the Initial Exclusivity Period is greater than or equal to [***], but is less than or equal to Ninety Million U.S. Dollars ($90,000,000), then Osiris will pay Stryker One Million U.S. Dollars ($1,000,000) for every [***] by which the Revenue for the Initial Exclusivity Period is below [***]; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	if Revenue for the Initial Exclusivity Period is less than [***], then Osiris will pay Stryker One Million Five Hundred Thousand U.S. Dollars ($1,500,000) for every [***] by which the Revenue for the Initial Exclusivity Period is below [
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	].
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	The payments described in the preceding
<U>
	clauses (a)&nbsp;and (b)
</U>
	&nbsp;are referred to herein as &#147;
<B>
	Supply Failure Payments
</B>
	.&#148;&#160; Osiris will pay any applicable Supply Failure Payment to Stryker within sixty (60) days after the end of the Initial Exclusivity Period.&#160; For the avoidance of doubt, Osiris will pay any applicable Supply Failure Payment to Stryker whether this Agreement terminates or whether Stryker elects to extend the Term on an exclusive basis in accordance
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="1" WIDTH="25%" NOSHADE COLOR="BLACK" ALIGN="LEFT">
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Confidential information has been omitted and filed separately with the Securities and Exchange Commission.&#160; Confidential treatment has been requested with respect to this omitted information.

<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	with
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.3(b)
</U>
	&nbsp;or on a non-exclusive basis in accordance with
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.3(c)
</U>
	.&#160; For the avoidance of doubt, any increases in any Supply Failure Payment to Stryker under
<U>
	Section&nbsp;6.5(a)
</U>
	&nbsp;or
<U>
	Section&nbsp;6.5(b)
</U>
	&nbsp;will be applied in full increments of $1,000,000 or $1,500,000 (as applicable) for each [***] shortfall in Revenue, and there will be no pro rating for cases where the shortfall is not evenly divisible by [***].
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	6.6
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Termination Payments to Stryker
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; Osiris will make certain termination-related payments to Stryker as provided in
<U>
	Section&nbsp;8.4
</U>
	and
<U>
	Section&nbsp;8.6
</U>
	, subject to and in accordance with the provisions set forth in those Sections.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	6.7
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Mode of Payment
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; All Customer Fees will be remitted to Osiris in the currency in which they were collected (or to be collected, as applicable).&#160; All Commissions and Administration Fees will be paid to Stryker in the currency in which the Customer Fees associated with such Commissions and Administration Fees were collected (or to be collected, as applicable).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	6.8
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Taxes
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; Osiris will be responsible for all sales, use, value-added and other taxes, customs duties and other governmental charges with respect to the provision of the Allograft Services and the associated Allografts to Customers.&#160; The Commissions, Administration Fees and other amounts payable by Osiris to Stryker pursuant to this Agreement will not be reduced on account of any taxes unless required by applicable law. Any taxes, duties, or other levies which Osiris is required by applicable law to withhold on remittance of any payment(s)&nbsp;due to Stryker under this Agreement will be deducted from such payment(s)&nbsp;to Stryker and timely paid to the appropriate taxing authority.&#160; Osiris will secure and send to Stryker proof of any such taxes, duties or other levies withheld and paid by Osiris for the benefit of Stryker, and cooperate, at Stryker&#146;s expense, with any reasonable request to help ensure that amounts withheld and/or paid are reduced and/or recovered to the extent permitted by the relevant jurisdiction.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;VII
<BR>
	OTHER OPPORTUNITIES
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	7.1
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Right of First Refusal
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; During the Term, Stryker shall have a right of first refusal with respect to any proposed transaction pursuant to which Osiris or any of its Affiliates would transfer, license or otherwise provide a third party with any rights with respect to any Allograft or any other product or service of Osiris or any of its Affiliates for&#160; orthopaedic or spinal bone growth application (a &#147;
<B>
	Covered Transaction
</B>
	&#148;).&#160; Prior to Osiris or any of its Affiliates entering into any Covered Transaction, Osiris will provide Stryker with written notice of the Covered Transaction, including the identity of the other party to the Covered Transaction and the terms and conditions on which Osiris or its Affiliate is willing to enter into the Covered Transaction (a &#147;
<B>
	Transaction Notice
</B>
	&#148;).&#160; Stryker will notify Osiris, within ten (10)&nbsp;business days after receiving the Transaction Notice (the &#147;
<B>
	Review Period
</B>
	&#148;), as to whether or not Stryker wishes to enter into a an agreement with Osiris or its Affiliate on the terms set forth in the Transaction Notice.&#160; If Stryker notifies Osiris that it wishes to enter into such agreement, then Osiris and Stryker will work in good faith to complete and execute definitive documentation for such agreement within thirty (30) business days after the date of such notice from Stryker (the &#147;
<B>
	Documentation Period
</B>
	&#148;).&#160; If either (i)&nbsp;Stryker notifies Osiris that it does not wish to enter into such agreement, (ii)&nbsp;Stryker fails to notify Osiris by the end of the applicable Review Period that it wishes to enter into such agreement or (iii)&nbsp;the parties do not complete and execute definitive documentation for such agreement within thirty (30) business days after the date of Stryker&#146;s notice that it wishes to enter into such agreement; then, in each of the foregoing cases, Osiris or its Affiliate (as applicable) shall be free to enter into a Covered Transaction with a third party on terms that are no more favorable to the third party than those set forth in the Transaction Notice.&#160; In no event will Osiris or any of its Affiliates enter into any agreement with a third party with respect to any matter for which Osiris is required to provide a Transaction Notice on terms that are more favorable to the third party than the terms set forth in a Transaction Notice, unless Osiris provides Stryker with another Transaction Notice that sets forth such more favorable terms, which other Transaction Notice will be subject to the provisions of this
<U>
	Section&nbsp;7.1
</U>
	.&#160; Neither Osiris nor any of its Affiliates will enter into any agreement with a third party with respect to the subject matter of a Transaction Notice prior to the expiration of the applicable Review Period (or, if applicable, any applicable Documentation Period).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

	***
</FONT>

	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

	Confidential information has been omitted and filed separately with the Securities and Exchange Commission.&#160; Confidential treatment has been requested with respect to this omitted information.

<A NAME="eolPage26"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE&nbsp;VIII
<BR>
	TERM AND TERMINATION
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.1
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Term; Post-Term Right of First Refusal
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; The initial term of this Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and shall continue until the end of the Initial Exclusivity Period, unless terminated as provided herein (the &#147;
<B>
	Initial Term
</B>
	&#148;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Upon expiration of the Initial Term, Stryker, at its sole option and upon ninety (90) days prior written notice to Osiris, may either:&#160; (i)&nbsp;extend the term of this Agreement on an exclusive basis for the Extended Exclusivity Period, as provided in
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.3(b)
</U>
	&nbsp;or (ii)&nbsp;extend the term of this Agreement on a non-exclusive basis for an additional two (2)&nbsp;years, as provided in
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.3(c)
</U>
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	If Stryker has elected to extend the term of this Agreement on an exclusive basis for the Extended Exclusivity Period, as provided in
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.3(b)
</U>
	, then at the end of the Extended Exclusivity Period, Stryker, at its sole option and upon ninety (90) days prior written notice to Osiris, may extend the term of this Agreement on an exclusive basis for an additional two (2)&nbsp;years.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Any extensions of the term of this Agreement pursuant to
<U>
	Section&nbsp;8.1(a)
</U>
	&nbsp;or
<U>
	Section&nbsp;8.1(b)
</U>
	&nbsp;are referred to herein as an &#147;
<B>
	Extension Term.
</B>
	&#148;&#160; The Initial Term, collectively with any Extension Terms, is referred to herein as the &#147;
<B>
	Term
</B>
	.&#148;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Following any expiration or termination of the Term, before granting any third party exclusive rights to market and promote the Allografts or Allograft Services, Osiris will offer the exclusive rights to Stryker on the same terms and conditions as Osiris has offered or will offer to third parties.&#160; Stryker will have 30 days during which to accept or reject the offer.&#160; If Stryker does not accept the offer within the time period, Osiris may enter into such an agreement with a third party on the terms and conditions that were offered to Stryker (or on terms and conditions that are more onerous to the third party).&#160; If Osiris offers the third party more favorable terms, Osiris agrees to first present those terms to Stryker, as provided herein. Osiris&#146;s obligation to present this right of first refusal expires 90 days after any expiration or termination of the Term.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.2
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Termination for Material Breach.
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; This Agreement may be terminated upon ninety (90) days prior written notice by either Party if the other Party materially breaches any of the terms, conditions or provisions of this Agreement and fails to remedy the breach within such ninety (90) day period;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	,
<U>
	however
</U>
	, that if such breach cannot be cured within such ninety (90) day period but (i)&nbsp;the breach is capable of cure, (ii)&nbsp;the breaching Party commences to effect a cure within such ninety (90) day period and (iii)&nbsp;the breaching Party diligently pursues such cure, then such Party will have so much time as is reasonably necessary to cure such default (but in no event more than six (6)&nbsp;months from the date of the notice of original notice of such breach).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.3
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Insolvency/Bankruptcy
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Either Party may terminate this Agreement immediately upon written notice to the other:&#160; (i)&nbsp;if the other Party ceases to do business, or otherwise terminates its business operations or (ii)&nbsp;if the other Party becomes insolvent or seeks protection under any bankruptcy, receivership, trust deed, creditors arrangement, composition or comparable proceeding, or if any such proceeding is instituted against the other Party and not dismissed within ninety (90) days.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.4
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Termination Due to Osiris Change of Control
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; In the event of a Change of Control with respect to Osiris or of any of its Affiliates that directly or indirectly control Osiris (an &#147;
<B>
	Osiris Change of Control
</B>
	&#148;), either Party may terminate this Agreement by providing the other Party with written notice of such termination;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	,
<U>
	however
</U>
	, that:&#160; (i)&nbsp;in no event will either Party provide such notice of termination more than thirty (30) days after the closing date of the Osiris Change of Control transaction and (ii)&nbsp;in no event will either Party provide such notice of termination at any time prior to January&nbsp;1, 2016.&#160; If a Party terminates this Agreement under this
<U>
	Section&nbsp;8.4
</U>
	, then the following provisions will apply:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	The effective date of the termination under this
<U>
	Section&nbsp;8.4
</U>
	will be the date that is twelve (12) months after the closing date of the Osiris Change of Control transaction.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">

</DIV>

<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	If either Party provides such notice of termination during the Exclusivity Period, Osiris will pay Stryker, within thirty (30) days after providing Stryker notice of termination under this
<U>
	Section&nbsp;8.4
</U>
	, an amount determined as follows (the &#147;
<B>
	Exclusivity Fee Refund
</B>
	&#148;):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 135.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-27.0PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	if the notice of termination was provided during the Initial Exclusivity Period, the Exclusivity Fee Refund that Osiris will pay to Stryker will be an amount equal to (A)&nbsp;Five Million U.S. Dollars ($5,000,000) multiplied by (B)&nbsp;a fraction: (1)&nbsp;the numerator of which is equal to the number of days between the effective date of termination of this Agreement and the date that would have been the last day of the Initial Exclusivity Period if this Agreement had not been terminated early and (2)&nbsp;the denominator of which is 1460; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 135.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-27.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 135.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-27.0PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	if the notice of termination was provided during the Extended Exclusivity Period, the Exclusivity Fee Refund that Osiris will pay to Stryker will be an amount equal to (A)&nbsp;the Extended Exclusivity Fee multiplied by (B)&nbsp;a fraction: (1)&nbsp;the numerator of which is equal to the number of days between the effective date of termination of this Agreement and the date that would have been the last day of the Extended Exclusivity Period if this Agreement had not been terminated early and (2)&nbsp;the denominator of which is 1460.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 135.0PT;TEXT-INDENT:-27.0PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	In addition, only if Osiris provides such notice of termination during the Exclusivity Period, then Osiris will make a one-time payment to Stryker (the &#147;
<B>
	Post-Termination Payment
</B>
	&#148;) equal to the greater of:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	thirty percent (30%) of the Revenue for the twelve (12) month period preceding the date on which Osiris provided Stryker with notice of termination under this
<U>
	Section&nbsp;8.4
</U>
	; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	].
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Osiris will pay the Post-Termination Payment to Stryker on or before the effective date of termination under this
<U>
	Section&nbsp;8.4
</U>
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.5
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Stryker Change in Control
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	.&#160; In the event of a Change of Control with respect to the Stryker division that is performing or directing the Stryker Services, such that such division is no longer directly or indirectly controlled by Stryker&#146;s ultimate parent company (a &#147;
<B>
	Stryker Change of Control
</B>
	&#148;), Osiris may terminate this Agreement by providing Stryker with prior, written notice of such termination;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	,
<U>
	however
</U>
	, that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	in no event will Osiris provide such notice of termination more than thirty (30) days after the closing date of the Stryker Change of Control transaction (or Osiris being informed of the transaction, whichever is later);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	if such notice of termination is provided during the first three (3)&nbsp;years of the Initial Term, such termination will not become effective until the end of the Initial Term;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	if such notice of termination is provided during the last year of the Initial Term, such termination will not become effective until the date that is one (1)&nbsp;year after the end of the Initial Term (and the Term will be automatically extended past the Initial Term for such one (1)&nbsp;year period without any obligation of Stryker to pay any Non-Exclusive Extension Fee or other amount, provided that the exclusive rights granted to Stryker under this Agreement will convert to non-exclusive rights effective as of the end of the Initial Term);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="1" WIDTH="25%" NOSHADE COLOR="BLACK" ALIGN="LEFT">
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT .5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="1" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Confidential information has been omitted and filed separately with the Securities and Exchange Commission.&#160; Confidential treatment has been requested with respect to this omitted information.

<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	if such notice of termination is provided during the first three (3)&nbsp;years of the Extended Exclusivity Period, such termination will not become effective until the end of the Extended Exclusivity Period;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">

	(v)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

	if such notice of termination is provided during the last year of the Extended Exclusivity Period, such termination will not become effective until the date that is one (1)&nbsp;year after the end of the Extended Exclusivity Period (and the Term will be automatically extended past the Extended Exclusivity Period for such one (1)&nbsp;year period without any obligation of Stryker to pay any Non-Exclusive Extension Fee or other amount, provided that the exclusive rights granted to Stryker under this Agreement will convert to non-exclusive rights effective as of the end of the Extended Exclusivity Period); and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">

	(vi)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

	if such notice of termination is provided during any Extension Term that Stryker has elected pursuant to
<U>
	Section&nbsp;2.3(c)
</U>
	&nbsp;or
<U>
	Section&nbsp;8.1(b)
</U>
	, such termination will not become effective until the end of such Extension Term.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;TEXT-INDENT:-.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.6
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Termination by Stryker Due to Third Party Action.
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; In the event that Stryker&#146;s marketing, promotion or sales of the Allograft Services is materially, adversely affected by any change in applicable Laws (excluding, however, any changes in applicable Law governing human allograft viable bone matrix products and related services generally) or any action of a third party imposing an injunction against the sales and marketing activities contemplated by this Agreement (i.e., any action by the FDA or any other governmental organization and/or any injunction resulting from a third party claim), unless such third party action is attributable to Stryker&#146;s marketing or promotion in violation of this Agreement or other wrongful conduct by Stryker or its Affiliates or Subcontractors that is in violation of this Agreement, then Stryker shall have the right to terminate this Agreement upon ninety (90) days prior, written notice to Osiris, unless the third party action or other basis for such termination is resolved during the aforementioned ninety (90) day period.&#160; If Stryker terminates this Agreement under this
<U>
	Section&nbsp;8.6
</U>
	, then Osiris will pay Stryker, within thirty (30) days after the effective date of such termination, an amount determined as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	if the notice of termination was provided during the Initial Exclusivity Period, the Exclusivity Fee Refund that Osiris will pay to Stryker will be an amount equal to (A)&nbsp;Five Million U.S. Dollars ($5,000,000) multiplied by (B)&nbsp;a fraction: (1)&nbsp;the numerator of which is equal to the number of days between the date on which such notice of termination was provided to Stryker and the date that would have been the last day of the Initial Exclusivity Period if this Agreement had not been terminated early and (2)&nbsp;the denominator of which is 1460; or
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	if the notice of termination was provided during the Extended Exclusivity Period, the Exclusivity Fee Refund that Osiris will pay to Stryker will be an amount equal to (A)&nbsp;the Extended Exclusivity Fee multiplied by (B)&nbsp;a fraction: (1)&nbsp;the numerator of which is equal to the number of days between the date on which such notice of termination was provided to Stryker and the date that would have been the last day of the Extended Exclusivity Period if this Agreement had not been terminated early and (2)&nbsp;the denominator of which is 1460.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	8.7
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>

</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; If the Initial Payment Trigger Date has not occurred by February&nbsp;28, 2015, then Stryker may terminate this Agreement by providing written notice to Osiris at any time after February&nbsp;28, 2015, but prior to the date (if any) on which the Initial Payment Trigger Date actually occurs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;

<B>

<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

	In the event of any expiration or termination of this Agreement, and without prejudice to any other rights and remedies available to the parties hereunder:&#160; (a)&nbsp;Osiris will provide Allograft Services and associated Allografts in accordance with Service Orders placed prior to the effective date of such expiration or termination and (b)&nbsp;all provisions in this Agreement related to such Service Orders (including provisions regarding payment of Customer Fees, Commissions and Administrative Fees) will remain in effect with respect to such Service Orders.

<B>

<U>

</U>
	, Osiris will pay Stryker, within thirty (30) days after the effective date of such termination, an amount equal to fifty percent (50%) of the Scientific Strategy Costs that have been incurred by Stryker.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">

	Notwithstanding anything to the contrary, in the event of any expiration or termination of this Agreement (other than by OTI pursuant to
<U>
	Section&nbsp;8.2
</U>
	), Stryker shall have the right to continue to sell Allograft Services with respect to any Allografts remaining in inventory at a customer until such inventory is exhausted (or, if shorter, until the date that is six (6)&nbsp;months after the effective date of such expiration or termination (or such later date as may be agreed upon by the Parties)) (the &#147;
<B>
	Sell-Off Period
</B>
	&#148;).&#160; The provisions set forth in
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.7
</U>
	,
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.8
</U>
	,
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.9
</U>
	,
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.10
</U>
	,
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.11
</U>
	,
<U>
	Section&nbsp;6.4
</U>
	and all other provisions in this Agreement that are applicable to the sale of Allograft Services will continue to apply with respect to any such sales during the Sell-Off Period, and each Party will continue to perform its obligations under this Agreement with respect to any such sales during the Sell-Off Period.&#160; Upon expiration of the Sell-Off Period, Osiris will be responsible for the disposition of any remaining inventory of Allografts; provided, however, that in no event will Osiris be permitted to sell or otherwise provide any Allograft Services with respect to any Allografts that are in packaging that bears any Bio
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6.5PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;TOP:-3.0PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160;Mark or any other Marks of Stryker or its Affiliates.

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>

	(d)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

	Termination or expiration of this Agreement will not relieve either party of its obligations or liabilities for breaches of this Agreement incurred prior to or in connection with such termination or expiration.

<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.1
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NOTA
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; The Parties acknowledge that NOTA prohibits the purchase and sale of human organs used in human transplantation, including bone and related tissue, for &#147;valuable consideration.&#148;&#160; The Parties acknowledge that NOTA permits reasonable payments associated with the removal, transportation, implantation, processing, preservation, quality control, and storage of human bone tissue and that Osiris provides services in some of these areas with respect to the Allografts.&#160; The Parties believe that NOTA permits payments in connection with the Stryker Services as reasonable payments associated with the processing, transportation, and implantation of the Allografts.&#160; The Parties acknowledge and agree that: (i)&nbsp;the Customer Fees to be paid by Customers to Osiris are in recognition of and are reasonable payment for the Allograft Service provided by Osiris and (ii)&nbsp;the fees to be paid by Osiris to Stryker are in recognition of and are reasonable payment for the Stryker Services.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.2
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Compliance with Law
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#160; Osiris shall comply with, and shall ensure that all Allograft supplied under this Agreement is developed, processed, stored, labeled, packaged, and distributed in accordance with, applicable Law, including 21 C.F.R. Part&nbsp;1271 and all applicable state and Canadian tissue bank registration requirements (including laws of California, Florida, New York, and Maryland), all other applicable federal, state, Canadian and professional standards and regulations including those of the American Association of Tissue Banks (the &#147;
<B>
	AATB
</B>
	&#148;), and current good tissue practices.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE COLOR="#010101" ALIGN="LEFT">
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.3
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Osiris Responsibilities
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Osiris shall recover or cause recovery of donor tissues in accordance with all applicable Laws.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Osiris will maintain donor eligibility records and production records and will make such records available to Stryker (i)&nbsp;during routine audits by Stryker and (ii)&nbsp;in a timely manner at such other times as reasonably requested by Stryker.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Osiris shall obtain and maintain all regulatory and governmental approvals, certifications and clearances necessary or advisable to enable Stryker and its Affiliates to market the Allograft Services in accordance with this Agreement, including all appropriate state licenses, FDA registrations and AATB accreditations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Osiris shall obtain a fully informed authorization for donation for all donors conforming with guidelines set forth from time to time by the AATB, and as otherwise required by applicable Law.&#160; Osiris shall use tissues for the Allografts only from those donors in which the consent allows the donated tissue to be provided to a for-profit organization for distribution within the United States and Canada.&#160; Osiris also agrees to reasonably work with Stryker to investigate means for increasing the volume of tissues available from donors in which the consent allows the donated tissue to be provided to a for-profit corporation for distribution outside of the United States.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Outside of the United States, upon agreement and budgeting by the JSC, Osiris shall apply for, and satisfy any requirements needed for obtaining, any regulatory and government approvals, certifications and clearances related to the activities contemplated under this Agreement, in each case as requested by Stryker and its Affiliates.&#160; Stryker will provide Osiris with reasonable assistance with respect to such efforts. The JSC will select the countries, if any, outside of the United States, for which to apply for and obtain such approvals, certifications or clearances.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(f)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Osiris shall notify Stryker of any recalls relating to any Allograft supplied to Customers hereunder within five (5)&nbsp;business days of receipt of initial information.&#160; Osiris shall be responsible for all Allograft recalls and for coordinating the recall with Stryker;
<U>
	provided
</U>
	,
<U>
	however
</U>
	, that Stryker shall be responsible for all communications with Customers concerning recalls, using messaging for such communications that is agreed upon by Stryker and Osiris.&#160; Osiris shall be responsible for the disposition of retrieved Allograft.&#160; Osiris shall be responsible for all costs associated with Allograft recalls and complaints, and will promptly reimburse Stryker and its Affiliates for any costs incurred in connection therewith.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(g)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Osiris shall accept, record, and investigate all complaints and adverse events regarding any Allograft supplied to Customers hereunder and shall notify Stryker of such complaints or adverse events and of the resolution in accordance with the Quality Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(h)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Osiris shall provide Stryker with copies of all notices of non-compliance with applicable regulatory requirements (including any FDA Form&nbsp;483&#146;s, notices from Health Canada and any state-issued non-compliance notices) received from any applicable regulatory authority related to Allograft supplied to Customers hereunder within five (5)&nbsp;business days of receipt.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Osiris shall be responsible for maintaining accurate return cards of Allograft distributed under this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(j)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Osiris shall comply with all applicable reporting and vigilance requirements and file all applicable adverse events in accordance with applicable FDA regulations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">

</FONT>

</FONT>
</B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Osiris shall notify Stryker of the response to all FDA, AATB and state investigations related to the Allograft supplied to Customers under this Agreement before said response is sent.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	9.4
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

	Stryker Responsibilities
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</B>
<B>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:3.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;

<FONT SIZE="2" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Stryker will comply with all applicable Laws in connection with its activities under this Agreement.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;TEXT-INDENT:-31.5PT;">
